posts.post_content:
I's like to tackle 1/2 of the T222 set this year. Looking for lower grade, small amounts of paper loss on back okay, no noticeable trimming, creasing okay if not through players face. Not looking for many of the high dollar cards at this time i.e. Alexander, WaJo, etc... Would like to be no more than $300 per cards right now.

Email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], or PM what you have available.

Thanks,

Steven

DJ

DJ, I'm shooting for a 2018 completion.
